/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are tall and modern, their facades made of glass and concrete, reflecting the sunlight and adding a touch of urban elegance to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the cityscape. In the distance, the tops of trees can be seen, hinting at a touch of nature amidst the concrete jungle. The street itself is lined with cars and pedestrians, adding life and movement to the scene. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
